channel.title: [emulous] Hits

item.title: [emulous] Hits
item.dc:creator: @jcrane164 jcrane164
item.description:
@jcrane164 wrote:

This is what i need to figure out, my updatemask for regular is 20 and i tried that to see if it would hit once and all it did was dc me. And if i do the 2nd one it is 2 hits and i have declared the 3rd the exact spots as the 2nd. So all i need is to get the figured out mask for 4 hits. Which i cant seem to do. Btw what is the “|” for?

[CODE] if (hitUpdateRequired) {
updateMask |= 0x20;
}

	if(hitUpdateRequired2) {
		updateMask |= 0x200;
	}
	if(hitUpdateRequired3) {
		updateMask |= 0x200;
	}[/CODE]

Read full topic
